import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./singlePost.css"; import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import useLocation from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; export default function SinglePost() { const {post, setPost} = useState(); const location = useLocation(); const path = location.pathname.split('/')[2]; useEffect(()=> { const getPost = async () => { const res = await axios.get("/Posts"+path) console.log(res); } getPost(); },[path]) return (
